entrance.description: The airlock groans as you force it open. Beyond lies a dark chamber, its walls covered in rust and corrosion. Emergency lighting flickers weakly, casting long shadows across the floor.

corridor_1.description: A long corridor stretches before you, disappearing into darkness. The air is thick with the smell of decay. Strange sounds echo from the shadows ahead.

storage.description: A cramped storage room filled with supply crates. Most have been pried open and looted long ago. A single working light panel illuminates stenciled warnings on the walls.

cargo_bay.description: You emerge into a cavernous cargo bay. Ancient shipping containers loom overhead, suspended by failing chains. The floor is littered with debris and what might be... bones.

bridge.description: The ship's bridge is surprisingly intact. Navigation consoles still flicker with power, displaying ancient star charts. The captain's throne sits empty, facing the viewports and the eternal void beyond.
